text:
@GovAbbott @GSF_OpenTexas Part 1. Never shut down everything to begin with.
Part 2. Doctor #COVID19 statistics by adding serology tests with regular tests.
Part 3. Once the public has a false sense of security, reopen stadiums and theme parks.

Did I miss anything?
